message.content:
cs.NE, cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.SY

The paper deals with training deep neural networks using backpropagation, which is a core topic in the field of neural networks and machine learning. Therefore, cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing) is the most likely sub-category. The paper also focuses on event-based computation and vision sensors, which suggests that it may belong to cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition) and cs.SY (Systems and Control). Additionally, the paper proposes a novel technique for training deep spiking neural networks, which involves optimizing the network parameters using gradient descent, indicating that it may also belong to cs.LG (Machine Learning) and cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence).
